title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Solana (SOL) Falls 3.9%, Leading Index Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Sui (SUI) was also an underperformer, declining 3.2% from Friday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2627.46, down 1.3% (-35.83) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Eight of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: DOT (+4.4%) and APT (+3.1%).

Laggards: SOL (-3.9%) and SUI (-3.2%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 1.3% with more assets trading lower than higher, led by significant drops in SOL and SUI.
